world.title: The Hero Battles the Dragon

world_bible.magic_rules: Magic is rare and dangerous, drawn from ancient runes and dragon blood. Only a few can wield it without consequence.
world_bible.tone: Epic fantasy with high stakes and heroic sacrifice
world_bible.anachronism_policy: Strictly medieval setting; no modern or futuristic elements allowed.

locations.name: Ember Hollow
locations.description: A small village nestled in the foothills, its thatched roofs glowing under the shadow of the distant Dragon's Peak. The people are wary but kind, preparing for the worst.

locations.name: Ashenwood Forest
locations.description: A dense, mist-laden forest where the trees whisper secrets of old battles. Strange glows flicker at night, and travelers often vanish without a trace.

locations.name: Blackforge Mines
locations.description: Abandoned iron mines now infested with cave trolls and glowing fungi. Rumors say the miners unearthed something they shouldn't have.

locations.name: Moonwell Shrine
locations.description: An ancient shrine built around a luminous spring said to grant visions. Now guarded by reclusive druids who distrust outsiders.

locations.name: Dragon's Peak
locations.description: A jagged mountain fortress where the great dragon Valthorax sleeps atop a hoard of cursed gold. Smoke curls from its summit even on clear days.

npcs.name: Elara
goals: find a cure for the blight
npcs.refusal_style: I’d help if I could, but my hands are full with the sick.

npcs.name: Borin Stonehand
goals: forge a weapon worthy of legend
repay his debt to the village
npcs.refusal_style: Not unless you’ve got coin or something useful to trade.

npcs.name: Thalia Brightflame
goals: survive long enough to write it down
npcs.refusal_style: Only if it helps stop Valthorax. Time is short.

npcs.name: Kaelen
npcs.refusal_style: I don’t guide fools into the woods. Prove you’re not one.

npcs.name: Fenris
npcs.refusal_style: Humans only bring fire and chains. Go back to your stone huts.

npcs.name: Garrick the Cursed
goals: warn others of the horror below
npcs.refusal_style: Please, you must listen! I’ll tell you anything—just get me out!

npcs.name: Rurik Ironvein
npcs.refusal_style: You’ll get nothing from me until my ledger is returned.

npcs.name: Mira Moonshadow
npcs.refusal_style: The well does not serve the curious. Leave before I make you.

world.starting_hook: You arrive in Ember Hollow just as the sky darkens with smoke from Dragon’s Peak. The villagers whisper that Valthorax has awakened—and this time, he’s hungry for more than gold.
world.initial_quest: Speak with Thalia Brightflame to learn how to defeat the dragon.

main_quest.title: Slay Valthorax
main_quest.description: Main progression requires completing side quests and obtaining their reward items.
main_quest.objective: Finish side quests and collect key items: healers_charm x1, emberforged_blade x1, moonwell_lens x1
main_quest.reward_hint: Peace will return to the land, and your name will be sung in every hall.

side_quests.title: The Herbalist’s Remedy
side_quests.description: Elara needs rare ingredients to treat the blight spreading through the village.
side_quests.objective: Collect 2 Moonpetal Blooms, 1 ashenroot, and 1 crystal_dewdrop for Elara.
side_quests.reward_hint: A charm that slows poison and disease.

side_quests.title: The Blacksmith’s Trial
side_quests.description: Borin seeks materials to forge a blade capable of piercing dragon scales.
side_quests.objective: Bring Borin 3 Blackiron Shards, 1 trollbone_hilt, and 1 ember_moss.
side_quests.reward_hint: A blade forged in dragonfire heat, capable of harming Valthorax.

side_quests.title: The Druid’s Test
side_quests.description: Mira Moonshadow will only grant access to the Moonwell if you prove your purity of intent.
side_quests.objective: Return 2 Silver Ferns, 1 ghostwillow_sap, and 1 unbroken_owl_feather to Mira.
side_quests.reward_hint: A lens that reveals the dragon’s hidden weaknesses.

quest_main_01.title: Slay Valthorax
quest_main_01.objective: Finish side quests and collect key items: healers_charm x1, emberforged_blade x1, moonwell_lens x1
quest_main_01.reward_hint: Peace will return to the land, and your name will be sung in every hall.

quest_side_01.title: The Herbalist’s Remedy
quest_side_01.objective: Collect 2 Moonpetal Blooms, 1 ashenroot, and 1 crystal_dewdrop for Elara.
quest_side_01.guidance: Delivery progress: moonpetal_bloom delivered 0/2 (bag 0), ashenroot delivered 0/1 (bag 0), crystal_dewdrop delivered 0/1 (bag 0)
quest_side_01.reward_hint: A charm that slows poison and disease.

quest_side_02.title: The Blacksmith’s Trial
quest_side_02.objective: Bring Borin 3 Blackiron Shards, 1 trollbone_hilt, and 1 ember_moss.
quest_side_02.guidance: Delivery progress: blackiron_shard delivered 0/3 (bag 0), trollbone_hilt delivered 0/1 (bag 0), ember_moss delivered 0/1 (bag 0)
quest_side_02.reward_hint: A blade forged in dragonfire heat, capable of harming Valthorax.

quest_side_03.title: The Druid’s Test
quest_side_03.objective: Return 2 Silver Ferns, 1 ghostwillow_sap, and 1 unbroken_owl_feather to Mira.
quest_side_03.guidance: Delivery progress: silver_fern delivered 0/2 (bag 0), ghostwillow_sap delivered 0/1 (bag 0), unbroken_owl_feather delivered 0/1 (bag 0)
quest_side_03.reward_hint: A lens that reveals the dragon’s hidden weaknesses.

recent_summaries: Player meets Elara for the first time in Ember Hollow. She introduces herself and explicitly mentions the required items for her active side quest: moonpetal_bloom x2, ashenroot x1, and crystal_dewdrop x1.
Player asks where they are. Elara confirms they are in Ember Hollow and reminds them of the quest to gather moonpetal_bloom, ashenroot, and crystal_dewdrop in Ashenwood Forest.
Player asks where they are. Elara confirms they are in Ember Hollow and reminds them of the quest to gather moonpetal_bloom, ashenroot, and crystal_dewdrop in Ashenwood Forest.
Player asks where to go next. Elara directs them to Ashenwood Forest for her quest items and mentions Borin the Blacksmith as another option.
